comments.author: Alex
comments.content: Such a great "pick" for a trip! Have you found a "reason" why they have so many old posters? Or are they new posters of old things?

comments.content:
To be honest I haven't really looked :S
Perhaps it was a special event related to the long weekend (movie festival?), but then I don't know where all the people went.
